description: Explore the evolution of frontend development with AI-driven design tools, dynamic WebGL animations, and adaptive SVGs. Delve into creative layout techniques with CSS, from shape-outside to seamless view transitions. Discover modern color features and CSS counters for enhanced styling, while Node.js's new globbing support simplifies file matching. Engage with WebGL and GSAP for interactive storytelling and compare Nuxt with Next.js to optimize rendering performance.
joke: Why do JavaScript developers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
challenge: Create an interactive comic strip using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Incorporate WebGL for dynamic backgrounds and GSAP for animating transitions between panels. Challenge yourself to make the navigation smooth and engaging, bringing the comic to life with interactive elements and unique visual effects.
